H0.text: Pollinators are the specific organisms with which many species of flowering plants have coevolved.

H1.text: Predators are the specific organisms that many species of flowering plants have coevolved with.

H2.text: Climates are the specific factors with which many species of flowering plants have coevolved.

H3.text: Spores are the specific organisms that many species of flowering plants have coevolved with.

A4.text: The evolution of nectaries in late Cretaceous flowers signals the beginning of the mutualism between hymenopterans and angiosperms.
